Best restaurant  experience in BarcelonaWonderful food.  Everything we tried was excellent.  The Salads, Daily specials, desert were all wonderful.They also do Guacamole that is my new standard for that favorite.Service was excellent and the waitress was a lot of fun  We spent a good portion of our Sunday afternoon here.  Ordered in 3 different waves.  Waittress was very helpful and patientI loved the food in Barcelona but this place stood out among the rest.
